snippet.title: Phoebe Prince
snippet.description: Anderson Cooper and bullying experts discuss the tragic story of Phoebe Prince, a Massachusetts high school student who was a bullying victim.

snippet.title: The Social Netjerk
snippet.description: Mark Zuckerberg invents Facebook. Watch more MAD on Cartoon Network!

snippet.title: Cyber Bullying
snippet.description: A 14-year-old boy asks Rosalind about the best ways to stop cyber bullying.

snippet.title: Pickle Farmer
snippet.description: Help Dante defend his pickles from attacking monsters with a variety of weapons.
